Steps.Description: The attacker inspects the web page source code and identifies a suspicious HTML img element with an onclick event.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that the onclick event contains malicious JavaScript code.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker manually examines the JavaScript code and confirms it as an XSS vulnerability.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker discovers that the JavaScript code triggers an alert popup with the flag.

Steps.Description: The attacker opens the browser console and executes the JavaScript code.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that executing the JavaScript code in the browser console will trigger the alert popup.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker pastes and runs the JavaScript code in the browser console.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully triggers the alert popup and obtains the flag.
